special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
descriptions: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The firenewt's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast mage armor (self only) at will, requiring no material components.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The firenewt is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, guidance, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, guidance, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

descriptions.raw: 1st-2nd level (2 2nd-level slots): burning hands, flaming sphere, hellish rebuke, scorching ray
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st-2nd level (2 2nd-level slots): burning hands, flaming sphere, hellish rebuke, scorching ray

special_abilities.name: Imix's Blessing.
descriptions: When the firenewt reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the firenewt gains 5 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Morningstar.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8+1) piercing damage.
